content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
  - Fuel: 4 units of coal
  - Status: No ingredients to smelt
  - Current inventory: 3 iron plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to place entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it on the map.

### Errors due to insufficient crafting materials
- Verify that you have all necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
